00038 typedef enum {
00039     SWI_RUNNING_TECH_UNKNOWN                   = 0, /* Modem runs in unknown mode */
00040     SWI_RUNNING_TECH_GSM                       = 1, /* Modem runs in GSM, GPRS, UMTS mode */
00041     SWI_RUNNING_TECH_LTE                       = 2, /* Modem runs in LTE mode */
00042     SWI_RUNNING_TECH_CDMA                      = 3, /* Modem runs in CDMA mode */
00043     SWI_RUNNING_TECH_EHRPD                     = 4, /* Modem runs in CDMA eHRPD mode */
00044 } SWI_RunningTech;
